page.title: 11HOME LIFE IN KILMERSDON
page.content: Life style is still determined by farming connections but electricity and the media have done much to bring the benefits of town life to the country. Car ownership has broadened horizons encouraging social mobility. Enthusiastic gardeners abound producing good fresh vegetables storing the surplus in freezers. There is always always keen interest in W I cookery demonstrations and the annual produce show. Many take great pride in their homes, which are central to the way of life in the villages. Houses are well equipped and both husband and wife are often DIY enthusiasts. There is plenty of hospitality mostly at an informal level. Both families and single people keep pets for companianship and protection. Cats, birds and dogs of all sizes are most popular.
